arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan will be hoping to make it three wins on the spin in Serie A as they make the trip to face Udinese on Saturday night. Milan head to Udinese seeking their third consecutive league win. arts.ttl: Udinese defender admits to being a Milan fan and names club legend as idol
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Udinese centre-back Nicolò Bertola has admitted that he is excited to face AC Milan, the team that he supports. After losing the first game of the Serie A season against Cremonese, Milan have responded well by beating Lecce away from home and Bologna at home. arts.ttl: Bravo insists Udinese will ‘play to win’ against Milan and admits Ibrahimovic admiration
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Udinese’s Iker Bravo is looking forward to facing AC Milan, insisting that he and his team-mates will play to win. Milan currently sit fifth in the table after consecutive league wins against Lecce and Bologna, but they face a Udinese side who are actually above them in fourth. arts.ttl: AC Milan’s Christopher Nkunku to start from the bench vs Udinese
arts.sum: On Sunday against Bologna, Christopher Nkunku made his official debut for Milan, coming on in the 85th minute in place of Santiago Gimenez. Despite the limited time, the Frenchman made a strong impact and even won a penalty that was shockingly not awarded to the Rossoneri. Nkunku is working hard to reach his peak form: […]
